TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPackageValidationRule

Docs.summary: Represents a rule to applied when validating a package in a SharePoint project.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 实现此<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationRule>接口可定义自定义验证规则, 以帮助验证 SharePoint 项目中的包是否有效。 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：为 SharePoint 解决方案](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions)创建自定义功能和包验证规则。
实现此接口的类必须包含要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>由项目系统发现的。
## Examples
|日期|历史记录|原因| |----------|-------------|------------| |[!INCLUDE[dev10_cpub1](~/includes/dev10-cpub1-md.md)]|添加了新的备注, 其中包含指向演示如何实现此接口的主题的链接|[!INCLUDE[enhancement](~/includes/enhancement-md.md)]|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateFeature(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature feature) cil managed

Docs.param: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.
The feature with which to validate the package.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified feature were added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此规则仅适用于包中的项目项, 则此方法不执行任何操作。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidatePackage(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a package currently violates this rule.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateProjectItem(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem projectItem) cil managed

Docs.param: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.
The project item with which to validate the package.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified project item is added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此规则仅适用于包中的功能, 则此方法不执行任何操作。
